info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pender and northeastern Bladen Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 505 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Folkstone to near Malpass Corner to 8 miles southwest of Harrells. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. SOURCE...Radar and Satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Rowan, White Stocking, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Maple Hill, Long Creek, Murray Town, Montague, Rooks, Malpass Corner, Ashton, Willard, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, Rocky Point, St. Helena, Atkinson and Watha. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 388 and 408. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
